rules_text:
Trample
Qiyan enters the battlefield with twice X +1/+1 counters on them.
If damage would be dealt to Qiyan while they have a +1/+1 counter on them, prevent that damage, remove that many +1/+1 counters from Qiyan, and create a 0/0 green Hydra creature token with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.
